data.title: SiteGround (@siteground) - WordPress user profile
data.meta_description: SiteGround’s powerful, yet simple to use managed WordPress services established us as one of the few hosting companies, officially recommended by WordPress.org. …
data.text:
SiteGround’s powerful, yet simple to use managed WordPress services established us as one of the few hosting companies, officially recommended by WordPress.org. Since 2004 we’ve been specialising in high-performance and secure web hosting solutions, crafted to make hosting management much easier, whether you’re building а small business website or multiple ones as a freelancer or a web agency.

More than 2 million domain name owners build, manage, and develop websites on our high-performance platform, powered by Google Cloud, using an array of in-house tools designed for seamless and faster WordPress hosting experience: WP Starter for an easy website launch; a free WP Migrator for hassle-free migrations; managed WP Autoupdates, WP-CLI, Staging & more tools for an effortless website maintenance. We ensure your websites are protected on multiple levels with our AI-powered smart security systems. Add our handy team and client collaboration tools, and you can easily build and manage multiple website projects under one roof.

The SiteGround team has not only been heavily involved in the WordPress community, sponsoring, organizing and speaking at hundreds of local meetups and WordCamps all over the world, but we also have multiple team members actively contributing to the WordPress project in different fields: from major version releases coordination to working on Core patches. In 2018, we also launched the SiteGround Ambassador program to help amplify the efforts of trusted WordPress experts to educate and drive the WordPress community forward.

SiteGround Ambassador Program: https://www.siteground.com/ambassadors

Read more about our managed WordPress hosting: https://www.siteground.com/wordpress-hosting.htm
